00001 !  ============
00002 !
00003 !   MAXWELL1 
00004 !   initialises 1D Maxwellian velocity distribution
00005 !
00006 !  ============
00007 
00008 subroutine maxwell1(u,nmax,i1,n,vt)
00009   implicit none
00010   integer, intent(in) ::  nmax, i1, n
00011   real, intent(in) :: vt
00012   real*8, intent(out) :: u(nmax)
00013   real, parameter :: pi=3.141592654
00014 
00015   integer :: p, ip1, ip2, i, cntr, nv
00016   real*8 :: f0 ,df, rs, v, dv, vmax, finf, vip, vth1, deltv
00017 
00018   if (n.eq.0) return
00019   nv = 30*n
00020   vmax = 4.0
00021   dv = vmax/nv
00022   f0 = 0.5
00023   finf = sqrt(pi/2.0)
00024   cntr = 1
00025   ip1 = n/2+i1-1
00026   ip2 = n/2+i1
00027 
00028   do  i=1,nv
00029      v = vmax - (i-0.5)*dv
00030      deltv = vmax/10.
00031      df = exp( max(-30.d0,-0.5*v**2) )*dv/finf*n/2.
00032      f0 = f0 + df       ! integrate dist. fn.
00033      if(f0.ge.cntr) then
00034         vip = vt*(v-dv*(f0-cntr)/df)
00035         u(ip1) = vip
00036         u(ip2) = -vip
00037         cntr = cntr + 1
00038         ip1 = ip1-1
00039         ip2 = ip2+1
00040      endif
00041   end do
00042 
00043   !  odd one out
00044   if (mod(n,2).eq.1) then
00045      u(n)=0.
00046   endif
00047 end subroutine maxwell1
